channel.title: Faqs on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Faqs on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: What is “Woke”? The woke movement is complex, but it can be summarized by one idea: everything is political. Woke ideas revolve around a multitude of topics such as cultural relativism, post-structuralism, postcolonialism, and postmodernism. Why is it bad? When political topics and agendas are heavily integrated into games, it can disrupt the escapism and enjoyment that many players seek. What makes a game woke? We’ve gathered some elements that are often present when it is applied in games.
